comment.author: Grayson
comment.text: It's funny, on the other hand, Trump complains that Clinton is getting donated by the Wallstreet, and what is Mr. Trump? It's incredible how mendacious they are. Since he wants to hire one from the Wallstreet as a finance minister, I can only say it goes on as before, the high finance determines what has to run. Whoever thinks normally comes to the conclusion: Nobody neither Trump nor Clinton would be good presidents. What an armistice.

replies.author: Madeline
replies.text: You're ok with Hillary Clinton taking money from foreign leaders and business to do their dirty work, or the fact she sends classified emails on a freaking private server, or when she called black men super-predators, or when she said she would crucify any woman who said they were raped by Bill, or the fact she's ok with hundreds of thousands of undocumented Syrian refugees, or when she told Goldman Sachs employees she was for open borders, or that she rigged the DNC, or when her goons were paid to insight violence at trump rallies, or the shite show in Benghazi, or the fact that she plans to tax the top 1% at 65% which means that a man making $440,000 only brings home $160,000, or that she plans to hike up minimum wage which destroys small businesses.

replies.author: Grayson
replies.text: The Clinton click is really highly criminal, this breed must be prevented.

replies.author: Sierra
replies.text: democrats Created KKK and racial divisions ! ok, never mind ,,,#VoteBlue! Continue to support: corruption, ISIS Syrian refugees over USA veterans, disaster Obamacare, open borders, late-term abortions, illegal criminals and so many other 'good things !
